Html: Help. I am able to log in to Facebook, however, I get stuck at the Constant Authorization page. No matter how much I click on Allow, the page won't change. I am pretty sure it's an IE8 problem though.

If clicking the buttons doesn't change the authorization page it may be a (hopefully transient) javascript problem with Facebook.  Fishbowl just hosts Facebook's connect pages for login.

If you are still having problems please contact me directly.  I can try to debug what's happening.

Thanks,

-Joe
Thanks for the quick reply, but it seems the problem has disappeared.
Glad it's resolved.  Facebook has been having weird problems over the last couple of days that are making Fishbowl look stupid :(
